ayah: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
ayah_translit: hal ata ala al-insani hinun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkuran
ayah_english: Has (there) come upon man a period of time not he was a thing mentioned

ayah: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
ayah_translit: inna khalaqna al-insana min nut'fatin amshajin nabtalihi faja'alnahu sami'an basiran
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] created man from a sperm-drop mixture (that) We test him; so We made (for) him hearing and sight

ayah: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
ayah_translit: aynan yashrabu biha ibadu al-lahi yufajjirunaha tafjiran
ayah_english: A spring will drink from it (the) slaves (of) Allah causing it to gush forth abundantly

ayah_english: They fulfill the vows and fear a Day (which) is its evil widespread

ayah: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
ayah_translit: wayut'imuna al-ta'ama ala hubbihi mis'kinan wayatiman wa-asiran
ayah_english: And they feed the food in spite of love (for) it (to the) needy and (the) orphan and (the) captive

ayah: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
ayah_translit: innama nut'imukum liwajhi al-lahi la nuridu minkum jazaan wala shukuran
ayah_english: Only we feed you for (the) Countenance (of) Allah Not we desire from you any reward and not thanks

ayah_translit: inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman abusan qamtariran
ayah_english: Indeed we fear from our Lord a Day harsh and distressful

ayah: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
ayah_translit: fawaqahumu al-lahu sharra dhalika al-yawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasururan
ayah_english: But will protect them Allah (from the) evil (of) that Day and will cause them to meet radiance and happiness

ayah: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
ayah_translit: muttakiina fiha ala al-araiki la yarawna fiha shamsan wala zamhariran
ayah_english: Reclining therein on couches Not they will see therein any sun and not freezing cold

ayah_translit: wadaniyatan alayhim zilaluha wadhullilat qutufuha tadhlilan

ayah_translit: wayatufu alayhim wil'danun mukhalladuna idha ra-aytahum hasib'tahum lu'lu-an manthuran

ayah: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
ayah_translit: aliyahum thiyabu sundusin khud'run wa-is'tabraqun wahullu asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahuran
ayah_english: Upon them (will be) garments (of) fine silk green and heavy brocade And they will be adorned (with) bracelets of silver and will give them to drink their Lord a drink pure

ayah: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
ayah_translit: inna hadhihi tadhkiratun faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi sabilan
ayah_english: Indeed this (is) a reminder so whoever wills let him take to his Lord a way

ayah: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
ayah_translit: wama tashauna illa an yashaa al-lahu inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman
ayah_english: And not you will except that wills Allah Indeed Allah is All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
ayah_translit: yud'khilu man yashau fi rahmatihi wal-zalimina a'adda lahum adhaban aliman
ayah_english: He admits whom He wills to His mercy but (for) the wrongdoers He has prepared for them a punishment painful
